## Loading and preprocessing the data
```{r, loadingData, echo=TRUE}
require("knitr")
dataDir <- "data"
if (!file.exists(dataDir)) {dir.create(dataDir)}
unzip("activity.zip", exdir=dataDir)
activity.df <- read.csv(paste0(dataDir, "/activity.csv"))
```
